attributes.additional_details: Call for a public enquiry into Police ethics. This should investigate the culture that allows the search for disinformation on Stephen Lawrence' family and issues like complicity in phone hacking; the treatment of protesters; the treatment of detainees; the day to day relationship between police and public; the appropriate penalties for Police officers who, themselves, break the law. Britain deserves a fair Police service, one that is, first and foremost, a service to all
